Params: {3: 'The platform could not withstand the battle between Gray Raven and the Corrupted—'}
{3: 'It shatters into pieces, separating the members of Gray Raven...'}
{1: '1', 3: "Korolev is completely untouched by Lee and Liv's shooting.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'It seems to have chosen you as the target, Commandant of Gray Raven.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: "Although significantly damaged, Korolev's weapon modules are still preparing for the next round of attack.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Watanabe moves forward as he prepares to face Corrupted Korolev alone.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Demolition Squad', 3: 'Attention to all Babylonia forces! Explosives have been installed on the gravity cabin wall structure! Ready for final detonation!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Demolition Squad', 3: 'All personnel will be exposed to the vacuum of space after detonation. Switch to vacuum mode immediately!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Why blast the cabin wall now...? What's Babylonia planning...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The cabin wall is destroyed by a giant explosion, but the debris does not fly inward.'}
{3: 'Instead, they are sucked out by the enormous negative pressure.'}
{3: 'Lucia strikes her blade into the ground and holds Liv with her other hand.'}
{3: 'While Liv tries her best to control the Levi-Guns, so that they do not get sucked into space.'}
{3: 'Watanabe grabs the shattered platform and reaches out his arm.', 4: '1'}
{3: "With Watanabe's support, you can now aim at Korolev's weak point—"}
{1: '1', 3: 'Meanwhile, Korolev continues to climb over with its robotic arms.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'But it lost balance after its "eye" is hit, and falls into the volatile torrent created by space.'}
{3: 'Watanabe shouts something, but he could hardly be heard.'}
{3: 'Although the air nearby gets completely drained, the chaotic scene does eventually come to a rest.'}
{3: 'You look into space through a hole created by the explosion and see a floating satellite.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Hello? The "Prism" is ready! It\'s up to you now, task force!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "There's only one chance! Once you've stabilized the core, send me the signal! Make sure it's not too early or too late!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Prism... I think I know what's going on now...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: "Huh? What's that sound... in the signal...", 4: '1'}
